Uses of Class
pa1.Cost

  • Packages that use Cost 
    Package Description
    pa1  
    pa1.exceptions  
    pa1.technologies  

    • Uses of Cost in pa1

      Methods in pa1 that return Cost 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Cost City.getBankCost()
      Cost of building a bank gold = production points = (# of banks + 1) * 400
      Cost Cost.getDiscountedCost​(double rate)
      Get a new Cost object with applied discount rate
      Cost City.getRoadCost()
      Cost of building a road gold = production points = (# of roads + 1) * 100
      Cost City.getUniversityCost()
      Cost of building a university gold = production points = (# of universities + 1) * 1500

      Initializes member variables

    • Uses of Cost in pa1.technologies

      Methods in pa1.technologies that return Cost 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Cost ManufacturingTech.getUpgradeCost()
      Upgrade costs: gold = production = (current level + 1) * 1000; science = 0
      abstract Cost Technology.getUpgradeCost()  
      Cost TradingTech.getUpgradeCost()
      Upgrade costs: gold = production = science = (current level + 1) * 1000;
      Cost WarTech.getUpgradeCost()
      Upgrade costs: gold = science = (current level + 1) * 1000; production = 0
